= Notes on the Data Set =

This is a defect data set that contains Halstead and McCabe metrics:
  * A tutorial on defect prediction can be found [http://code.google.com/p/promisedata/wiki/ShortTutorialOnDefectPrediction here].
  * Information about Halstead metrics can be found [http://code.google.com/p/promisedata/wiki/Halstead here].
  * Information about McCabe metrics can be found [http://code.google.com/p/promisedata/wiki/McCabe here].

  * How Good is Your Blind  Spot Sampling Policy?; 2003; Tim Menzies and Justin S. Di Stefano; 2004 IEEE Conference on High Assurance Software Engineering ([http://menzies.us/pdf/03blind.pdf http://menzies.us/pdf/03blind.pdf]).
